title: Knight Hacks' Official Fall GBM!
description: To kick off the semester, come to our first Fall '21 General Body Meeting! This event will be an introduction to everything Knight Hacks. Come learn about our mentorship and projects programs, share ideas for workshops you'd like to see (or host!) throughout the semester, opening for joining our internal Knight Hacks teams, and a game night to wrap it all to a close. See you soon!
